content: यत् {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> (यतते, यतित) {@--1@} To attempt, endeavour, strive, try (usually with <ab>inf.</ab> or <ab>dat.</ab>); सर्वः कल्ये वयसि यतते लब्धुमर्थान् कुटुंबी <ls>V. 3. 1.</ls> {@--2@} To strive after, be eager or anxious for, long for; या न ययौ प्रियमन्यवधूभ्यः सारतरागमना यतमानं <ls>Śi. 4. 45</ls>; <ls>R. 9. 7.</ls> {@--3@} To exert oneself, persevere, labour. {@--4@} To observe caution, be watchful; <ls>Bg. 2. 60.</ls> {@--5@} <ab>Ved.</ab> To excite, stir up, rouse. {@--6@} To join, associate with. {@--7@} To go, proceed. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (यातयति-ते) {@--1@} To return, repay, requite, recompense, restore. {@--2@} To despise, censure. {@--3@} To encourage, animate. {@--4@} To torture, distress, annoy. {@--5@} To prepare, elaborate. {@--6@} <ab>Ved.</ab> To join, unite. {@--7@} To cause to be returned or restored.
